title: State motto
context: §5-9 State motto. The motto &ldquo;Ua mau ke ea o ka aina i ka pono&rdquo;, is adopted, established, and designated as the official motto of the State. It is translated into English to mean &ldquo;The life of the land is perpetuated in righteousness&rdquo;. [L 1959, JR 4, §1; Supp, §14-5.3; HRS §5-9; am L 1979, c 145, §2]
